common.title: Am I being shadowbanned?
common.description: A twitter shadowban checker. Let's check whether you are shadowbanned.

user.title: User Exists
user.description: Indicates whether the user is a public or private account.

search.description: A search ban is a ban that prevents the target user's tweets from appearing in search results.

suggestion.description: Search suggestion ban is a ban that prevents a user's profile from appearing in search suggestions when typing something like "@Twitter" in the search field.

ghost.description: Ghost ban is a ban that prevents the target user's tweets from being displayed in the reply tree.

reply-deboost.unknown: Unable to determine reply deboost ban
reply-deboost.description: Reply deboosting is a restriction that prevents the replies of the target user from being displayed unless you click "Show more replies" in the reply tree.

error.network: It seems there is no Internet connection.

share.content: Check out this awesome tool to check if a user is shadow banned from Twitter!
